discussion.content:
1. model-driven app
2. power flow

The answer is:

• Allow customers to check store inventory from the company's website -> Model-driven app

• Email the product purchasing manager if a customer checks store inventory and the product is not in stock -> Power automate

1. Power Virtual Agent
2. Power Automate
Problem with using Power BI to present stock levels on a company web page is that it can't generate a trigger when 0 stock is found, which Power Automate can use to inform the purchasing manager about. Only workable option is to embed a bot in the webpage for the customer to question stock levels through. The bot can trigger the flow when no stock result is returned to customer.
